metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29824 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** A use-after-free issue was discovered in Py_FindObjects() function in SciPy versions prior to 1.8.0. NOTE: the vendor and discoverer indicate that this is not a security issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29824` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-scipy - 1.10.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: scipy package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.1-2').
